en_title: Secretary for Justice visits SPC and MFA
zh_title: 律政司司長到訪最高人民法院及外交部

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, visited the Supreme People's Court and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Beijing today (February 25).

Ms Cheng met with Vice-presidents of the Supreme People's Court, Mr Luo Dongchuan and Mr Yang Wanming, respectively in the morning. She then met with the Director-General of the Department of Treaty and Law of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Mr Xu Hong, in the afternoon. Matters relating to dispute resolution services in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and the Belt and Road related regions were discussed during the meetings.
Ms Cheng will return to Hong Kong tomorrow morning (February 26).
zh: 律政司司長鄭若驊資深大律師今日（二月二十五日）在北京展開訪問行程，到訪了最高人民法院及外交部。
鄭若驊上午分別與最高人民法院副院長羅東川及楊萬明會面，而下午則與外交部條約法律司司長徐宏會晤，期間雙方商討了有關在粵港澳大灣區及「一帶一路」相關地區的爭議解決服務發展事宜。
鄭若驊明日（二月二十六日）上午返抵香港。

She then met with the Director-General of the Department of Treaty and Law of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Mr Xu Hong, in the afternoon
Matters relating to dispute resolution services in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and the Belt and Road related regions were discussed during the meetings.
Ms Cheng will return to Hong Kong tomorrow morning (February 26).
